name: auraltester
description: Aural testing software for music students

scripts.test: cd backend && npm run test && cd ../frontend && npm run test:once
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && mvn spring-boot:run"
scripts.install: cd backend && npm ci && cd ../frontend && npm ci

author: Kenny Hung
